resources.string: If you are not using an Xperia Play, check this
Change the reported screen density to change size of controls - leave blank to disable
Use the built-in version of the Slickcraft texture pack by NathanX
Extract original textures with root access
Backup original APK with root access and set it as the texture pack
Successfully set original APK as texture pack.
Unable to gain superuser access - are you rooted?
It seems you are using textures from an older version of Minecraft PE. Please run \"Extract original textures with root access\" in the options screen again to update textures.
Select .png file to change skin to (will only be visible to you)
Redirect Realms to third-party server list
Control the player by rotating your device. Requires ModPE Scripts to be turned on.
Show \"Insert text\" option in in-game patch manager
Disable ModPE scripts\' access to Android functions,\nlike deleting files and using internet
A fix to keyboard bugs in the new 0.8.x update
Download skins based on PC username
Pretty much everything on this page is useless. They are here for troubleshooting bugs.
Upgrade to BlockLauncher Pro to patch more than 3 patches

BlockLauncher has detected a recent crash. Safe Mode has been enabled to prevent further crashes by misbehaving patches. In this mode, all patches are disabled. Do you want to continue in Safe Mode without patches or return to normal patching mode?
Do you want to import this patch?
These patches cannot be patched because they are not in a format that BlockLauncher recognizes:
Do you want to set this skin?
Do you want to set this texturepack?
Do you want to import this ModPE Script?
Copyright © 2013–2017 Zhuowei Zhang. Do not distribute without permission.

This program uses the aFileChooser library by Paul Burke. 
 This program contains code from Snowbound's PTPatchTool, licensed under the Eclipse Public License. 
 This program contains a modified version of NathanX's Slickcraft texture pack: used with permission.
 Parts of the built-in texture pack is based on RepetiCraft by Theevilpplz and used with permission.
 This program contains a version of the Cydia Substrate framework by Saurik, licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License.
 This program uses the libsuperuser library by Chainfire.
 This program contains a copy of the Rhino JavaScript engine from the Mozilla project.
 For full licensing information, check the Minecraft Forums thread.
This application was made possible by the work of many talented translators, testers, and programmers. Thank you.\nView the Minecraft Forums thread for a list of contributors.
Open Minecraft Forums thread for BlockLauncher
BlockLauncher cannot find a copy of Minecraft PE on your device. This app is designed to patch the full version of Minecraft Pocket Edition by Mojang.
Thank you for trying BlockLauncher. BlockLauncher starts your copy of Minecraft Pocket Edition and adds additional features to it through patches, addons, skins, and textures.
Your device runs Android Jelly Bean or newer, so BlockLauncher cannot access the default textures. The demo texture pack has been enabled so you can test the launcher.
To get started with BlockLauncher, tap the wrench icon at the top of the screen. For more help, visit the Minecraft Forum thread.
This version of Minecraft PE is not supported by BlockLauncher. BlockLauncher will run in safe mode temporarily. Please check for updates to BlockLauncher as support may be added in a newer version.
This feature is not supported in BlockLauncher yet.
Enter the ID of the script to import
Enter the address of the script to import
Upgrade to BlockLauncher Pro to patch more than one script at a time
An error occurred in a ModPE Script
Your ModPE Scripts have been disabled in multiplayer. They will be re-enabled when you disconnect from the server.
ModPE scripts are not supported on your version of Minecraft PE. Some methods in scripts may not function, or may crash the launcher. Use at your own risk.
Do you want to import this script? It will get access to the same resources as your BlockLauncher instance, including potentially your passwords and other sensitive information.
has been disabled because it encountered too many errors. Sorry!
ModPE Script support is required to take screenshots. \nYou can enable ModPE Script support in the Launcher Options page.

Unfortunately, BlockLauncher cannot run on your device as security software on your phone, such as Samsung Knox or SELinux, is preventing live patching. 

 We are working on a fix for this, but in the meantime, BlockLauncher functions are limited to patching .mods and loading texture packs. 

ModPE scripts cannot be loaded, and all .mod patches require a restart.
Allows the application to be loaded as an addon into BlockLauncher. This means that this app can access network, storage, and do anything Minecraft PE has the permission to do.
Use old live patching code from BlockLauncher 1.6.8
Turn this on if BlockLauncher stopped working after the 1.6.9 update.
Enable command history on chat screen
Hide the navigation buttons during gameplay
There are no recordings to view.

Certain video and audio capture functionality is Powered by Kamcordâ„¢ (kamcord.com), and your use of such functionality is subject to the Kamcord Terms of Use (kamcord.com/tos) and Privacy Policy (kamcord.com/privacy)
Audio engine : FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies
You need to install the Substrate app to use BlockLauncher. (You do not have to set it up, and you do not need root access: you only need to install it.)
Write crash logs to shared storage

This version of Minecraft PE is not supported by this version of BlockLauncher.\nYou have Minecraft PE MINECRAFT_VERSION, but BlockLauncher only supports Minecraft PE SUPPORTED_VERSION. Please update your copy of Minecraft PE.
You need to purchase the BlockLauncher Extras package to use this feature.

Unfortunately the version of Minecraft PE on this device is not compatibile with BlockLauncher. Please install Minecraft PE for ARCH processors.\n(You probably didn\'t purchase Minecraft: if that is the case, buy a legitimate version of Minecraft, which will be compatible with ARCH processors)
The addons ADDONS cannot be loaded as they do not support ARCH processors.

For this feature to work, you need to re-import each of your scripts manually once so that BlockLauncher can remember their original locations.\nRe-importing scripts automatically may pose a security risk. Disable this feature if you do not need it.
Change inventory and crafting windows to Desktop mode
Unfortunately, the Store functionality is not supported in BlockLauncher.
